A-WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
DATED:  4.12.2006 
 
Circular No.29/ 2006 
 
Subject:- 
Anti-hijacking  Mock Exercise  at  Airports. 
 
In continuation  of this  Bureau  Circular  No. 29/2005 dated  27.7.2005 on 
the subject cited above, the  following  instructions shall be  implemented   by all  
concerned  with immediate effect:- 
 
(i) 
Mock  exercises   to  test the  efficacy  of the  Contingency  Plan   shall  be   
conducted  regularly at  each airport  after  getting  the  exercise  plan approved  
from COSCA.    
 
(ii) 
The mock exercise  plan  will be submitted to the  BCAS by the  Chief  
Airport  Security  Officer through the Airport  Director of the Concerned  Airport 
for  approval  at least one  month in advance from the proposed date of exercise. 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl Commissioner of  Security (CA)
